SELECT COUNT(id) FROM `attendance`.`items`
`conglomerate_id`=#{conglomerate_id}
and `items_name` like concat ("%",#{items_name},"%")
and `bloc_name` like concat ("%",#{bloc_name},"%")
and `type` like concat ("%",#{type},"%")

SELECT i.`id`, i.`conglomerate_id`, i.`staff_id`, i.`items_name`, i.`bloc_name`, i.`type`, i.`uptime`, i.`uptimeC`, s.`staff_name` AS `staff_name` FROM `attendance`.`items` i LEFT JOIN `attendance`.`staff` s ON i.`staff_id`=s.`id` WHERE i.`conglomerate_id`=#{conglomerate_id} ORDER BY i.`uptime` DESC
SELECT i.`id`, i.`items_name`FROM `attendance`.`items` i WHERE i.`id`=#{id}
